name: pure-prompt
description: Pretty, minimal and fast ZSH prompt

scripts.postinstall: dest=/usr/local/share/zsh/site-functions/; mkdir -p $dest && ln -sf "$PWD/pure.zsh" $dest/prompt_pure_setup || echo 'Could not automagically symlink the prompt. Check out the readme on how to do it manually: https://github.com/sindresorhus/pure#manually'
